line-highlight.title: Line Highlight
line-highlight.description: Highlights specific lines and/or line ranges.

line-numbers.title: Line Numbers
line-numbers.description: Line number at the beginning of code lines.

show-invisibles.title: Show Invisibles
show-invisibles.description: Show hidden characters such as tabs and line breaks.

autolinker.title: Autolinker
autolinker.description: Converts URLs and emails in code to clickable links. Parses Markdown links in comments.

wpd.title: WebPlatform Docs
wpd.description: Makes tokens link to WebPlatform.org documentation. The links open in a new tab.

custom-class.title: Custom Class
custom-class.description: This plugin allows you to prefix Prism's default classes (.comment can become .namespace--comment) or replace them with your defined ones (like .editor__comment). You can even add new classes.

file-highlight.title: File Highlight
file-highlight.description: Fetch external files and highlight them with Prism. Used on the Prism website itself.

show-language.title: Show Language
show-language.description: Display the highlighted language in code blocks (inline code does not show the label).

jsonp-highlight.title: JSONP Highlight
jsonp-highlight.description: Fetch content with JSONP and highlight some interesting content (e.g. GitHub/Gists or Bitbucket API).

highlight-keywords.title: Highlight Keywords
highlight-keywords.description: Adds special CSS classes for each keyword matched in the code. For example, the keyword if will have the class keyword-if as well. You can have fine grained control over the appearance of each keyword by providing your own CSS rules.

remove-initial-line-feed.title: Remove initial line feed
remove-initial-line-feed.description: Removes the initial line feed in code blocks.

inline-color.title: Inline color
inline-color.description: Adds a small inline preview for colors in style sheets.

previewers.title: Previewers
previewers.description: Previewers for angles, colors, gradients, easing and time.

autoloader.title: Autoloader
autoloader.description: Automatically loads the needed languages to highlight the code blocks.

keep-markup.title: Keep Markup
keep-markup.description: Prevents custom markup from being dropped out during highlighting.

command-line.title: Command Line
command-line.description: Display a command line with a prompt and, optionally, the output/response from the commands.

unescaped-markup.title: Unescaped Markup
unescaped-markup.description: Write markup without having to escape anything.

normalize-whitespace.title: Normalize Whitespace
normalize-whitespace.description: Supports multiple operations to normalize whitespace in code blocks.

toolbar.title: Toolbar
toolbar.description: Attach a toolbar for plugins to easily register buttons on the top of a code block.

copy-to-clipboard.title: Copy to Clipboard Button
copy-to-clipboard.description: Add a button that copies the code block to the clipboard when clicked.

download-button.title: Download Button
download-button.description: A button in the toolbar of a code block adding a convenient way to download a code file.

diff-highlight.title: Diff Highlight
diff-highlight.description: Highlights the code inside diff blocks.

filter-highlight-all.title: Filter highlightAll
filter-highlight-all.description: Filters the elements the highlightAll and highlightAllUnder methods actually highlight.

treeview.title: Treeview
treeview.description: A language with special styles to highlight file system tree structures.
